title: You could ask Claude what's possible here
detail: When you're not sure what's possible, ask. Claude can explain its capabilities, suggest approaches, or tell you what information would help it help you. Turning Claude into a guide to its own abilities unlocks possibilities you didn't know existed.
surface_triggers: User seems unsure how to approach a problem. User asks something that could be done multiple ways. User might not know what Claude can do. Task is open-ended or exploratory. User is new to a type of request.
